tool_description:
Search and find gas stations in France nearby your position.

You can get all the stations in one call.

Prices are updated every 10 minutes
name: Fuel price in France in realtime
title: Fuel price in France in realtime
tool_name: Fuel price in France in realtime

api_list.name: Gas station search

required_parameters.name: max
required_parameters.description: Max gas stations to be returned

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fuel-price-france.p.rapidapi.com/stations/search?position=48.866667,2.333333&max=20&limit=50"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fuel-price-france.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fuel-price-france.p.rapidapi.com/stations/search?position={position}&max={max}&limit={limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fuel-price-france.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All the gas stations at once
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fuel-price-france.p.rapidapi.com/stations/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fuel-price-france.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Gas station data

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fuel-price-france.p.rapidapi.com/stations/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fuel-price-france.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
